dc:title: Energy Performance Certificates (EPC) data table.
dc:description: This table describes EPC data and building characteristics for a given selection of properties
dc:creator: Custom selection of EPCs from https://epc.opendatacommunities.org/domestic/search

columns.dc:description: Individual lodgement identifier. Guaranteed to be unique and can be used to identify a certificate in the downloads and the API.
The official unique identifier for teh property.
Current energy rating converted into a linear 'A to G' rating (where A is the most energy efficient and G is the least energy efficient).
